channel.title: ♦ Life on Chen's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ♦ Life on Chen's Blog

item.description: Ich bin erschöft heute, da arbeitete ich ganz Tag 8 Stunden im Büro. Am Morgen met ich eine Kolligin N von mir in Frankfurt Hbf. I'm exhausted today because I did work 8 hours in office today. During this 8 hours, I attended 3 meetings, contacted with 7 colleagues(online and offline, working and eating). I was CC for 14 times! But the real number of the Emails that I needed to check is only 4. I can tell my colleagues had a busy day today, since today is kind of important for release preparation but some of responsible persons are on holiday this month. There was one email literally saying(based on my understanding), come on someone please check this issue, the team we are cooperating is hard to handle…
